title: Samurai Pumpkin Patch
text:
10:00 a.m. Saturday, Oct. 31, 2015 Categories 
Events, Kids | Family, Sports At Aikido of Tamalpais, the kids program will be holding a free Samurai Pumpkin Patch on Saturday October 31st from 10am-noon or until pumpkins last. Kids physical ages 6-17, or adults mental equivalent ages can come and test their sword striking skills. Kids get priority, We will be using wooden swords to split various size pumpkins in half. Loads of fun, cathartic, raises ones energy, and is a great workout. Location: 142 Redwood Ave, Corte Madera, CA 94925 Contact: Dolanoarthur@gmail.com or 415-264-0157 Website: aiki-kids.com
